mapper.sql: device_id, utdid, androidid, buildversion, soft_channel_id, chan_name, create_time, update_time, versioncode, manufacturer, androidmodel, uuid, buildrelease, versionname
mapper.select: select from t_device where utdid=#{utdid} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into t_device (device_id, utdid, androidid, buildversion, soft_channel_id, chan_name, create_time, update_time, versioncode, manufacturer, androidmodel, uuid, buildrelease, versionname) values (#{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{utdid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{androidid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{buildversion,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{softChannelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chanName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{versioncode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{manufacturer,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{androidmodel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{uuid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{buildrelease,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{versionname,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into t_device
device_id,
utdid,
androidid,
buildversion,
soft_channel_id,
chan_name,
create_time,
update_time,
versioncode,
manufacturer,
androidmodel,
uuid,
buildrelease,
versionname,
#{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{utdid,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{androidid,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{buildversion,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{softChannelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update t_device
utdid = #{utdid,jdbcType=CHAR},
androidid = #{androidid,jdbcType=CHAR},
buildversion = #{buildversion,jdbcType=TINYINT},
soft_channel_id = #{softChannelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
chan_name = #{chanName,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
versioncode = #{versioncode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
manufacturer = #{manufacturer,jdbcType=CHAR},
androidmodel = #{androidmodel,jdbcType=CHAR},
uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=CHAR},
buildrelease = #{buildrelease,jdbcType=CHAR},
versionname = #{versionname,jdbcType=CHAR},
where device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_device set utdid = #{utdid,jdbcType=CHAR}, androidid = #{androidid,jdbcType=CHAR}, buildversion = #{buildversion,jdbcType=TINYINT}, soft_channel_id = #{softChannelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, chan_name = #{chanName,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, versioncode = #{versioncode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, manufacturer = #{manufacturer,jdbcType=CHAR}, androidmodel = #{androidmodel,jdbcType=CHAR}, uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=CHAR}, buildrelease = #{buildrelease,jdbcType=CHAR}, versionname = #{versionname,jdbcType=CHAR} where device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select d.device_id as deviceId, d.utdid, d.androidid, d.buildversion, d.soft_channel_id as softChannelId, d.chan_name as chanName, d.create_time as createTime, d.update_time as updateTime, d.versionname, d.manufacturer, d.androidmodel, d.buildrelease from t_device d left join t_user_device u on d.device_id = u.device_id where u.user_id is null AND soft_channel_id = #{channelId} order by d.create_time desc
select count(device_id) from t_device where create_time >= (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))
